name: Jump Space
notes: The strange dimension ships traverse during interstellar jumps. No navigation possible. Duration: ~168 hours (1 week Â± 10%).

roleContent.captain: Ship is in jump space. No external communications possible. Review crew status and plan arrival procedures.
roleContent.astrogator: Jump calculations locked. Monitor for any anomalies. Prepare exit coordinates for destination system.
roleContent.pilot: No piloting required in jump space. Rest and prepare for emergence maneuvers.
roleContent.engineer: Monitor jump drive status. Fuel consumption is locked. Prepare for post-jump diagnostics.
roleContent.sensors: External sensors non-functional in jump space. Internal diagnostics only.
roleContent.gunner: Weapons offline during jump. Use time for maintenance and calibration checks.
roleContent.medic: Good opportunity for crew health checks. Some passengers experience jump sickness.
roleContent.steward: Passengers may be anxious. Maintain calm atmosphere. Prepare for arrival activities.
roleContent.cargo: Verify cargo security. Prepare manifests for destination customs.

visualStyle.description: Swirling abstract patterns representing the non-Euclidean geometry of jump space
